home.title: Free Sorting Task
home.description: «FST-LAB» is a tool dedicated to the implementation of a free sorting task (or Free Categorisation Task) with auditory and/or visual stimuli.
home.description2: Easily configure tasks, take participants inside the lab or remotely, download your results, and only if you want, share your configurations and data with other users.

objectives.title: How to use the platform (freely)
objectives.description1: Use the 'Register' button at the top right of this screen to register with the platform.
objectives.description2: After accepting your registration, you will be able to configure your next experiment!

privacy.gdpr: Please respect the European regulations regarding data, i.e. the GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation)

list.title: List of Experiments
list.message: Discover all experiments available on our platform

detail.placeholderResult: Explain why you want access to the results...
detail.placeholderExperiment: Explain why you want access to this experiment...
detail.requirement: Message must contain at least 10 characters

loading.error: An error occurred while loading the experiments

header.title: Demo Experiments
header.description: Discover how our platform works through these interactive demo experiments.

sound.title: Sound Experiments
sound.description: Explore our audio-based experiments. Classify and organize different sounds according to your criteria.

image.title: Visual Experiments
image.description: Discover our image-based experiments. Categorize and analyze various visual content.

image_sound.title: Multimedia Experiments
image_sound.description: Combine sounds and images in these complex interactive experiments.

login.title: Register for the experiment
login.privacy_notice: Your data will remain anonymous and no voice recording will be made during this experiment.
login.error: An error occurred with this identification number.
login.generic: An error occurred during registration. Please try again.

pause.title: Experiment Paused
pause.message: This experiment is currently paused. Please try again later.

stop.title: Experiment Ended
stop.message: This experiment has ended. Thank you for your interest.

not_found.title: Experiment Not Found
not_found.message: This experiment doesn't exist or has ended.

default.title: Error
default.message: An error occurred while accessing the experiment. Please contact the administrator.

toolbar.testMode: Test Mode - No data will be saved

error.generic: An error occurred while loading the experiment. Please try again.
error.reload: An error occurred while reloading the experiment. Please try again.

session.quit_session: How would you like to quit?
session.quit_session_message: Warning: if you quit this session, you won't be able to resume it. Are you sure you want to quit?
session.quit_session_message_test: You are currently in test mode. No data will be saved, and this session is used for demonstration purposes only.

feedbackSection.title: Your feedback
feedbackSection.label: Please share your experience regarding this experiment
feedbackSection.placeholder: Share your thoughts, difficulties, or suggestions...

modal.title: Session End Confirmation
modal.message: Are you sure you want to end this session? You won't be able to resume it.

thankYou.title: Thank you for your participation!
thankYou.message: Your results have been successfully recorded. You can now close this window.
thankYou.messageTest: Thank you for testing the experiment. No data was recorded as you were in test mode.

unfinishedModal.title: Unfinished Session Detected
unfinishedModal.message: A session is already in progress. Would you like to continue it or start a new one? Starting a new session will delete the current session.

testModeModal.title: Test Mode Activated
testModeModal.description: You are currently in test mode. This means:

features.testOnly: This mode is only for testing the interface and functionality

errors.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support the Speech Recognition API. Try Chrome or Edge.
errors.microphoneAccess: Microphone access error. Please check permissions.
errors.microphoneDenied: Microphone access denied. Please allow access in your browser settings.
errors.noSpeech: No speech detected. Try speaking louder.

article1.title: Article 1: Purpose
article1.content: These Terms and Conditions (T&Cs) govern the use of the 'FST-LAB' website. By accessing this site, you fully accept these T&Cs.

article2.title: Article 2: Site Access
article2.content: The site is freely accessible to any user with internet access. Costs related to accessing the site (hardware, connection, etc.) are the responsibility of the user.

article3.title: Article 3: Site Content
article3.content: Content published on 'FST-LAB' is protected by intellectual property rights. Any unauthorized reproduction, representation, or exploitation is prohibited.

article4.title: Article 4: Liability
article4.intro: The 'FST-LAB' site cannot be held liable in case of:
article4.item3: Use that does not comply with the T&Cs

article5.title: Article 5: Personal Data
article5.content: The use of the site may involve the collection of personal data. This data is processed in accordance with our Data Protection Policy.

article6.title: Article 6: Modification of T&Cs
article6.content: We reserve the right to modify these T&Cs at any time. Users will be informed of any modifications via the site.

article7.title: Article 7: Applicable Law
article7.content: These T&Cs are governed by French law. Any dispute will be subject to the jurisdiction of the competent courts.

privacy.title: Personal Data Protection
privacy.intro: The information collected about you is processed by MSHS-T, located at 5 allée Antonio Machado, F-31 058 Toulouse cedex 9, +33 (0)5 61 50 35 28. Information can be requested from the CNRS Data Protection Officer – dpd.demandes@cnrs.fr.
privacy.dataCollected: Personal data such as name, first name, email address, affiliated organization or function will be collected.

context.title: In the context of:
context.directory: managing a directory of UAR staff and associated laboratories (name, first name, phone, email address, laboratory, status, function, mission);
context.newsletter: newsletter subscription (name, first name, email address);
context.events: participation in scientific events, conferences and training (name, first name, email address, institution/laboratory/company, function).

recipients.title: Data Recipients
recipients.organizers: organizers of each scientific event, conference or training session.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis
legalBasis.content: The processing is necessary for the legitimate interests pursued by the data controller

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.newsletter: Newsletter subscription: until unsubscribe request by the concerned person
retention.content: Content: for directories, until the person's departure at the latest, for other news during the website's operational period

transfer.title: Data Transfer Outside EU
transfer.content: Information published on the website may be read outside the European Union due to its presence on the Internet.

rights.title: Individual Rights
rights.description: Any person concerned by this personal data processing can access and obtain a copy of their data, object to the processing of this data, have it rectified or deleted. You also have the right to limit the processing of your data.

contact.mshs: You can exercise these rights by contacting the MSHS-T communication service:
contact.dpd: You can also contact the CNRS DPO at the following address: DPD –2 rue Jean Zay–54519 –Vandoeuvre lès Nancy Cedex –

rights.cnil: If you believe, after contacting us, that your Data Protection rights are not being respected, you have the option to file a complaint with the CNIL:
